info.name: Socket.IO Game Server
info.description:
Note: This is a Socket.IO server. For full testing, use the test-client.js script.

This collection is for reference only - Socket.IO requires WebSocket connections, not traditional HTTP requests.

request.description:
This server uses Socket.IO which operates over WebSockets.

To test with Postman:
1. Use the test-client.js script (recommended)
2. Or use Postman's WebSocket feature:
   - New Request â†’ WebSocket Request
   - URL: ws://localhost:4000/socket.io/?EIO=4&transport=websocket
   - Connect and send Socket.IO formatted messages

Socket.IO Events:
- session:create
- session:subscribe
- session:get
- session:join
- session:start
- session:answer
- session:next
